remarks: A sequence in a Hausdorff space converges to at most one limit.  Part of Lemma 1.4-2(a) of [Kreyszig] p. 26.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Jan-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
statement:
lmmo.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. Haus ) $.
lmmo.4 $e |- ( ph -> F ( ~~>t ` J ) A ) $.
lmmo.5 $e |- ( ph -> F ( ~~>t ` J ) B ) $.
lmmo $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
